PART I CONSTITUTION, OBJECTS, POWERS AND FUNCHONS OF THE NATIONAL INSTITUTE OF FLAMEATION MANAGEMENT

2 (1) There shall be established an Institute which shal! xstablishment be called the “National Institute of Plantation Management” Nuaional (hereinafter referred to as the Institute”), which shall Plantations” consist of the persons who are for the time being members Management, of the Institute under section 6,

jet of (@) to provide, by itself or in association with other Bye Fnutute institutions in Sri Lanka or abroad, training facili- . ties and programmes relating to plantation manage- ment to all categories of employees working in the plantations ; (b) $0 provide regular refresher and orientation courses {n Plantation Management to employees in service +

(@) to carry out research into areas of plantation manage- ment and labour relations that are not already provided for in other similar institutions.
